skins.selfIntroduction: I am the battleship named Monarch, one of the rejected King George V-class designs. Hmph, though I was once forgotten, now I live and breathe...
skins.acquisition: We meet for the first time. I am the battleship Monarch. Hmph, once I was discarded, but now I am needed; how ironic... Is this how low the Royal Navy has sunk?
skins.login: Splendid; you're back. I, Monarch, am superior to the likes of Wales and York. Wouldn't you agree, Commander?
skins.details: You are the one and only being who matters to me... Until I met you, there was nary a single soul who believed in me.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Wales and York... I despise them for bereaving me of my existence, but I cannot resent them for succeeding me.
skins.secretaryIdle2: A younger sister? If I have one, her name would be... Prince of Wales... That has a rather nice ring to it.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I will make the world understand how foolish it was not to choose me.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Do not fall victim to those degenerate habits of theirs.

skins.shipDescription: Hmph. One's outfit is merely superficial. True nobility must come from within. Don't you agree, Commander?
skins.acquisition: Hmph. One's outfit is merely superficial. True nobility must come from within. Don't you agree, Commander?
skins.login: Don't just stand there gawking, Commander. There remains much to be done today.
skins.details: Stand up straight and puff out your chest, Commander. You're the only one I deign to¡ª You're not sure where to look? Well, why not look me in the eyes then?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Shall I teach you the Royal Navy's courtly dances?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Such splendid dress is normally reserved for special occasions. But for me, every day I exist is a day to be celebrated.
skins.secretaryTouch: You like this dress, do you? Hmph, I see you've learned the art of empty flattery from Wales. But nonetheless... thank you...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I admire your bravery. Now would you rather I stab or trample you? Or would you prefer to taste a volley from my guns?

skins.shipDescription: So, an Eastern outfit this time... Hmph. My nobility is evident regardless of what I wear. However, since you prepared this outfit especially for me, it would be unbecoming of me to not express my gratitude. Thank you.
skins.acquisition: So, an Eastern outfit this time... Hmph. My nobility is evident regardless of what I wear. However, since you prepared this outfit especially for me, it would be unbecoming of me to not express my gratitude. Thank you.
skins.login: This festival comes but once a year. I shan't let you waste it working yourself to death. Come, let me handle that. The fleet will survive you taking a break.
skins.details: "Paint our jubilant memories of this festival into history"? Hmph, she's as grandiloquent as ever, isn't she?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Tsk, Wales, must you always pester me with this Eastern Radiance chinoiserie? I'll learn about their customs myself, without you.
skins.secretaryIdle2: A New Year's wish? Naturally, I wish to prove you were right to choose me. That isn't going to change.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Though I am a proud lady of the Royal Navy, I find myself deeply moved to have this chance to experience a festival from an exotic culture.
skins.secretaryTouch: You desire my company? You should have said so.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Have you been afflicted with Wales's vile proclivities? Commander?
